website_summaries.verdict: It's a sound option if you prefer a nylon collar and snap buckle, but  there are other quality collars available for less money.
pros: Made of strong nylon with eco-friendly plastic hardware
Comes in 4 sizes and numerous vivid colors
Falls at the lower end of the price range
cons: The snap buckle isn't as strong as metal buckles, and it's not recommended for highly active dogs

customer_reviews.title: Works well for goats, too!
customer_reviews.text: While I realize most people buy these collars for a dog or cat, we bought them for our goats! The collars have stood up very well, even when faced with some curious goat nibbles. They are showing a little dirt, but after 5 months in a goat pen, I think they still look pretty great. I'm back to order the 1" size as the girls have grown large enough. For the record, Harriet (Tubman) is wearing the blue collar and Ruth (Bader Ginsburg) is sporting the pink one!
customer_reviews.author: Thornberry Gatwick

customer_reviews.title: NOT suitable for strong dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This collar broke the second day we had it. My dog was on a lead and he bolted. The stitching holding the center ring that the lead was clipped to came undone, and he escaped. The the picture to see how weak the stitching (and glue) was that held it together.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear007

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this collar!!! I got the purple one and it's so adorable on my Pitbull's solid grey coat. I got a size mediuim for her and she weighs almost 40lbs. It's thick and durable just as I was needing. Will be purchasing from this buyer again!
customer_reviews.author: Angie k

customer_reviews.title: Great color, Cooper-approved!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the royal blue (Dodger blue for my fellow fans ;-) ) for my golden retriever puppy when he outgrew his cat sized collar. I bought the medium and tightened it all the way when he was smaller (~20-25bs) and it fit well. Fast forward to today, hes 55lbs and it's been loosened about half way and still has room for him to grow. It's held up very well between him always getting wet (if there's water to play in, he finds it), rough housing at the dog park, and recently the beach; it hasn't faded and the color hasn't bled. I wouldn't hesitate to buy again and would highly recommend this collar.
customer_reviews.author: K. WyattTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ***update *** material is slippery and it keeps loosening
customer_reviews.text: Nice but the material is slippery and it keeps loosening. I have the check it every couple of days and re adjust.*** update ***** 3 months after I purchased this product it has started to unravel. I still need to tighten this every other day and the company responded to my previous comments saying that I installed it incorrectly, but could not show me a proper installation.
customer_reviews.author: Vicenta Pyles

customer_reviews.title: Love the vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of Blueberry pet products and these are no exception. I have a 70 lb German Shepherd puppy and they fit him well and are durable. Even though he chews on them after a bath sometimes, they show no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W

customer_reviews.title: This collar killed my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My poor sweet baby was playing in my backyard with my other dog when his mouth became wrapped in the loop. As he tried to pull away the collar became tighter and tighter. Despite myself, my Roomate, and upwards of 10 of my neighbors attempts to free Malibu from the collar, we were too late. It was probably 3 minutes from when we heard their cries to the moment she gone. Please do not use this collar and instead choose a product with an emergency release like a clasp, and please hug your pets extra tight. I wish i could go back and never buy this product. Rest In Peace Malibu.
customer_reviews.author: Ander

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased. Very poor customer care.
customer_reviews.text: Collar does not fit even though I measured before ordering. Went to process a return and they want to charge me $6.00 to send it back. For a $10.00 collar, that is not worth my time. I will not be purchasing from this company again. Unfortunate considering I have two dogs and am always in need of gear for them.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Ashdown

customer_reviews.title: Neon Green Blueberry Collar is a winner
customer_reviews.text: I really love this collar. The color is great and the quality is there. I purchased this for my AB puppy who has a 14" neck and the medium fits greats with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Topaz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice collar: ) It's a good quality material
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collar :) It's a good quality material, strong, and easy to adjust. Our 73 lb lab/boxer pulls a lot when we go for walks and we wanted something that would ensure he doesn't slip out of his collar altogether if he sees another dog, person, animal etc but wouldn't *actually* choke him like a regular choke collar. This works wonderfully - it loosens immediately once he stops pulling. Would definitely purchase again if need be, though this product feels like it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this one..
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Bought sz recommended..Half of the name and contact information is difficult to read because overlaps.on collar. Because was personalized was unable to return. Bought 2 for my GSD's and now have to buy an ID tag since can not read ID information on either of the collars. Also does not appear to be a true Martingale collar. Very cheaply made, but was very expensive.!! Is useless for purpose of ID and using for a Martingale collar..
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Avery

customer_reviews.title: Not for Toy dogs. Heavy, large clasp from this lead to dog harness.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Malti-Poo, an 8 pound Toy breed, to safely ride in the car. Sadly, the clasp on this seatbelt lead (that is to hook on to the harness) is very heavy and too big for a small/toy dog. It measures 3 inches in length and appr 1 inch wide. The clasp on my leash is approximately 1 1/2 inches long and 1/2 inch wide (at widest part) and is also much smaller and lighter overall. The other end of this lead has the seatbelt insert which is much smaller and lighter. I think for a bigger dog (perhaps 20-25 plus pounds) this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: J4USA

customer_reviews.title: Great concept.... But
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this, but once I got the collars and adjusted them to fit my dogs necks you could no longer see the phone number/contact info. It was stuck underneath the adjuster. I ended up throwing them both in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not useful as a training collar!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this item. It is advertised as a training collar but the cinch length between the rings is too short to be effective as a training tool. The color and quality were OK but this collar is poorly engineered!
customer_reviews.author: Pookiebeardog

customer_reviews.title: Had to cut it off
customer_reviews.text: Our 20 pound whippet had this collar on, and while she was outside playing it got caught around in her bottom jaw and she couldn’t lift her head or even walk in a straight line thankfully my husband saw her outside and ran else there with a pocket knife and cut off the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Sizes wrong
customer_reviews.text: The medium is really a small. Advertised as 14.5-20”. Our dogs neck is 16”. Definitely does not fit. This collar would only fit a really small dog.
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: You really do get what you pay for. I bought my German Shepherd a few Kong brand collars in the past but it was getting expensive since he was outgrowing them. I decided to buy something more cost efficient but the quality is definitely subpar. The color has already started to fade, the stitching has started to tear and the buckles look like he’s worn the collar for years instead of just a few months. I never experienced any of these issues with Kong brand products. Needles to say, this collar is being thrown away and replaced with a Kong collar.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy material on dog's skin
customer_reviews.text: I recently picked up a Aussie mixed puppy at 11 week old. This collar was affordable, the correct color that I wanted (light pink), and just everything I was looking for. At first she was alright with the color but began noticing that she was constantly scratching herself at the color. Thinking it was just her not being used to it, I didnt bother looking at it until a family member said something. She doesn't have fleas or anything like that. After closer inspection, the dog side has the stitching sticking out and was probably stabbing her a bit since her fur isn't very thick. Maybe I got a dud but I wouldn't recommend this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Not for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My pup uses a 10 inch collar and this should have worked fine. But if I adjust it down to fit her neck, part of my phone number is covered up. I should have only put my phone number on there, but I included “Please Call”, because it allowed that many characters. Big mistake! Now I can’t use this collar at all because the most important info, my phone number, isn’t visible. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw--get one with a buckle!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the size I needed based on my puppy's head and neck size. This collar is not supposed to be left on but when I tried to take if off, I could not get it back over his head. I finally got scissors and cut the stupid collar off. So now it is in the trash. Waste of money and caused both me and the puppy distress. When my puppy gets a little bigger I will buy the kind that has a buckle for removing it.
customer_reviews.author: rcburto

customer_reviews.title: Big fat no from me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay buckled...I got out of the car and wasn’t really paying attention because I had buckled my dog-before I knew it she was jumping through my drivers side door and I had to catch her, yikes! (This happened twice but I was ready for the potential escape to happen the second time around)
customer_reviews.author: Hj

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit collar!
customer_reviews.text: I hate it! Hard to fit, had to put on multiple times to adjust and finally got to tight by accident and had to cut it off her! Hate this product! Not easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally maniscalco

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog, and the placement of the text is centered on the collar, so when I adjust it to fit her part of the phone number is covered by the buckle. This would mean that if she were lost, someone would have to remove and expand the collar to figure out the number-not ideal. If the text was left centered (where the company logo is) it would be better. It's also bulkier than I was expecting; the buckle never really lays correctly and sticks out. I bought a metal ID tag that slips on her old collar and it works much better, and was less costly.
customer_reviews.author: Emma MC

customer_reviews.title: Just not right.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I bought the size according to the description to fit my dog but what I received would MAYBE fit a hamster. Secondly, this is supposed to be a training collar. A training color should have some chain on it to make sound when you pull on it, the sound it makes is how you train not by actually pulling and choking the dog.. This collar is not made for training, I did not realize this had nylon where there should be chain when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mabs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Yorkiepoo!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is very small as you can see. Every extra small collar I purchased was too big. This one fit perfectly. It was nicely made, durable, and easy to adjust to my yorkiepoo neck size. He’s super curly so you can’t see it much in the picture but it’s a perfect fit. IG: ForeverDaddysGirll
customer_reviews.author: Alicia G.

customer_reviews.title: OVER PRICED, AND VERY SMALL LOW QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. Its wierd, I didnt see all these reviews prior to purchase. Otherwise, I would of mad a better purchase decision. I'm super unhappy with it. This collar, in my view, is over priced...It's worth about $3.99, not $8.99 plus shipping. I love shopping Amazon, the only down fall, and I'verun into this over and overnow, and that is scale, size of products. This collar is cheaply made and much smaller. In a retail establishment, I wouldn't have purchased it. Basically a hardy kitten collar! Shame, shame, shame...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two one for each Dog and my male broke one of the plastic parts with in two weeks now its way to big and I had to use his old coller. Dont wast your money find one with metal pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry collars are thee best
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 so I'm not sure which on this is. So I'll explain this way. I previously bought the exact same color but an extra small size for my min pin. He's growing so I got him the small and it was literally the same size as the extra small. So I ordered another one that was medium and it fits perfect. I love the Blueberry brand especially since you can have pets names embroidered on them. So that was my only issue. Otherwise, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kaltenbach

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my kitten
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to measure and purchase according to sizing as listed. Very cute and decent material, it looks great on my kitten!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Beware. This collar is not properly designed. Even with the collar adjusted properly there is too much slack in the loop that tightens the collar around the neck when pulled. As a result if the collar is left on an unattended dog there is a good possibility the dog will be able to slip this loop into his mouth which could cause significant harm or worse. I would look for a better designed martingale with a shorter loop.
customer_reviews.author: G Budd

customer_reviews.title: Contains sharp corners and stitching
customer_reviews.text: There isn't too much a dog collar has to do: Stay on. Not scratch up the dog. Look nice comes in a distant 3rd. This is a strong nylon collar with what appear to be decent buckles. It will almost certainly stay on. Unfortunately, given that some of the corners and stitching are quite stiff and sharp, it fails on the "Not scratch up the dog" test. No one should ever even have to say this. You would NEVER put something this poorly or dangerously made on a child. Why would them make it this way for a dog?
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Great collars for growing puppies
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar and the color too (Mint Blue). I have a golden retriever puppy and I purchased the small. When I received it I used a seam ripper to remove the brand tag so that I could further adjust the collar to make it smaller. I took my puppy home at 7 weeks and 5 days (almost 8 weeks old) and the collar fit her almost perfect, it was just a little loose but not enough that she could take it off. She is now almost 4 months old and the collar still fits and I still got plenty of space for adjusting it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, lovely turquoise blue color, and the label was easily removed with a seam ripper. Ultimately very unhappy with my purchase because of the location of the leash clip. It was too close to the clasp, as you can see in the photo, and the combined weight kept it in the wrong place, the front. I was always searching for the leash clasp unlike another collar I own that didn't have the same design issue and problem. I no longer use it and it will be donated to frustrate someone else.
customer_reviews.author: don't you wish you knew

customer_reviews.title: wrong color lettering
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth would you use PINK for lettering on a RED collar. Looks horrible and is not readable. Your photo shows yellow lettering on a red collar. That is what I expected. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking for a true martingale collar
customer_reviews.text: Not a true martingale collar. These are a pain to take off and put on multiple times a day
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good collar. Good price. Watch out for the size!
customer_reviews.text: The collars are good quality and the lettering is well done. Overall I'm happy with the purchase but a little annoyed by the sizing. If you see in my photo, the clip is interfering with the clear legibility of the phone number. It still works but I would have gone with the size smaller had I thought about that issue. The only other small quip I have is the dashes in my number weren't included like I had requested. Overall I'm happy with the purchase and recommend the collars. Just go with the smallest one that'll fit your pet!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Well made, love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my small dog and one for my large dog, both are great! I’m in the habit of checking the insides of all collars for sharp pokey stitching or rough edges where the nylon overlaps because so many collars have this and rub uncomfortably on short haired dogs, I was pleasantly surprised especially with the price point that great attention was paid to have a smooth transition at overlap. Both fit exactly as described and I love the turquoise color. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attentive customer service and durable collar
customer_reviews.text: Very attentive customer service from seller. Collar received was very sturdy feeling comfortable looking when I put it on my dog. My dog falls into very large category but realized that I will have to adjust size of collar where the adjusting clip will fall in between dog name and phone number I had it customized (which I didn't have any trouble with since the letter/number embroidered section is as flat as other part). Very satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kim

customer_reviews.title: Bad advertising placement
customer_reviews.text: The collar appears sturdy, but the ridiculous placement of the advertising piece cuts off 2 inches of adjustments. My dog has a 14" neck but I could not tighten this collar to 14" because of the name tag in the way. I took the annoying label off and was able to make the collar smaller and therefore fit my dog. This is a just dog collar, there's no reason to make our pet a walking billboard.
customer_reviews.author: Anya Wales

customer_reviews.title: Becareful
customer_reviews.text: This collar does not have a clasp. It is sized, then just slipped over the dogs head. So if your dog is still growing and your not watching or she gets caught up on something (this happened to my dog) you can't just release the clasp. I had to cut the collar off. Good thing I was with the dog when it happened. I will not purchase this style of collar again.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Great collar!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these! The visibility of the name and phone number is great! If the tag comes off the collar someone will still be able to call me if they find my dog. They dont even need to look at the tag, actually. I get so many comments on these collars, saying what a great idea it is! I agree. They are machine washable, which is nice, too. the plastic connectors do break, and thats why I have had to replace them, but thats after a decent amount of time. so its not a huge deal. For the price, these are a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DZKimmi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't write reviews of relatively inexpensive items that didn't work or failed before they should have. However, with so many glowing reviews about durability, I felt I needed to send in my review. This did not last three weeks with our 5 and a half month old Goldendoodle. Somehow he was able to break this with scratching at it. It was tight enough so he couldn't get his mouth on it, but loose enough based on the two-finger method discussed by the manufacturer. I will attempt to fix it with epoxy, but I shouldn't have to. This should have lasted. I guess naming the dog Loki was appropriate. Dog of mischief.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Thorne

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand collar.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand collar for my dogs. I had brought in the past a small, medium small, and two medium collars they all seem to work really well! I haven’t replaced one on one of my dogs for about two or three years. It has held its color nicely. I wash it with dawn dish soap every two months and let it air dry. It hasn’t dyed my dogs fur when wet. I always take their collars off to wash them and put them back on when it’s good and dry. Honestly I probably won’t buy my dogs collar in the store unless it’s this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR DOGS THAT CHEW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is fine under normal circumstances but, as title suggests, not for dogs that chew. This seatbelt lasted exactly one trip, about 2 miles. My large puppy chewed the fabric 'seatbelt' during the first use rendering it unsafe for further use. I hate giving this a low score as the seatbelt was made well but it's only for 'normal' dogs, NOT for dogs that were sired by Satan himself with razor sharp teeth that seek & destroy everything in sight. If you're completely sure your dog will not chew this, go ahead, it's a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Large emblem gets in the way of an otherwise perfectly beautiful collar!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Blueberry collars, BUT... I REALLY wish that the Blueberry Emblem was NOT on the collar!!!!! With all the ways to save your favorite items nowadays, there really is no need to have such a HUGE rubberized and raised emblem that actually hinders in the use of the collar, by not allowing the emblem to fit through the adjustable buckles easily. AND, it takes up SO much room on an otherwise perfectly beautiful collar! I paid for a collar, not for the company to advertise their own business on my dog!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Where Art Thou?
customer_reviews.text: The collar we received is beautiful. Unfortunately, it has sharp edges on the inside and the "Blueberry Pets," label takes up so much space (and is placed to be the first thing seen) on the collar that my pets name and my number are relegated under the tightening loop and around. I contacted customer service who was happy to help, quickly disappearing after I said they had solved my problem (promising to send a new collar I have never received). So yeah, their product looks great! If it were only functional.
customer_reviews.author: Silverwaters

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar but adjuster covers custom text.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two customized collars - one for each of my two dogs - with their names and my phone number. The collars seem to be high quality and the colors are as expected. Unfortunately, once the collar is adjusted, the adjuster lands directly in the middle of the text. It looks a bit silly but if my dogs ever got lost, I'm sure the person who finds them could figure it out. It would be better if the Blueberry tag was on the other side of the text so that this wouldn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: dleigh

customer_reviews.title: Unique Color Selection, High Quality, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Super solid collar. Absolutely love the color and that it's not like every other collar or leash sold in mainstream pet stores. I use it on our black wire haired dachshund mix so it pops even more, and she gets complimented all the time! It's held up great, even through doggy daycare visits which has proven to be rough on these. We bought the matching leash as well. This was my first time purchasing this brand but I definitely recommend both this product as well as the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! I love the simple colors and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I love the simple colors and it seems to made of good quality material (no issues attached to a leash or anything). I have been adjusting it as my puppy grows and I love how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the green and it's awesome. These collars are well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in a large for my 70 pound pit bull. I ordered the green and it's awesome. These collars are well made, and the large fit him well. I think he did have room to make the collar larger if he needs it. BUT he has a very large, thick neck and this fit him very well. The color is hard to describe because it was so bright and brilliant. It is like a lime green. Very, very nice. After purchasing this collar for him, I actually ordered another printed collar from blueberry pet for another of my dogs. I can't say enough about how nice these collars are!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry Pet Follower
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a couple Blueberry Pet collars and have not been disappointed. One was XS when I first picked up my puppy (6lbs) and the next was a S (13lbs). It’s easy to clip on and take off and the plastic fastener is pretty sturdy. I only use this collar to hold is tags (never attach the leash to the collar since we use a harness) so am not sure what it would be like with pulling or resistance. My dog is a small-medium with a double coat - a very fluffy lion mane head - and the S fits great! Nice color selection too.
customer_reviews.author: M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and has no clasp
customer_reviews.text: This collar is made of flimsy-seeming material, but I can't speak to its durability because it won't fit my dog. It is much smaller than I expected -- I did carefully measure her neck and ordered accordingly -- and it won't even fit over her head. Sliding over her head is the only way to put it on, too, because there is no clasp and no way to adjust the collar. The color is lovely, though. It's just a shame I wasted my money on it and can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little collar for my little pup, unfortunately, her sister's collar was accidentally sent to the wrong post office, so I'm only collar training one puppy at a time, I really wanted to get them both used to their collars at the same time. ** Update!! I FINALLY got the other collar, I can NOT believe how long it took to get here and the crazy confusing journey this tiny collar took! This thing has seen more miles in the past week and a half then I've seen all YEAR!! Okay, so that being said, just like the other collar, great fit on my little puppy, colors are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Foster-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Pet Collar, Well Made, Solid Clasp
customer_reviews.text: The Blueberry Pet Collar is a great collar to get for your dog or cat. My dog really didn’t need a new collar, but we got one for him anyways for Christmas “just because”. The collar was exactly as colored, was easy to adjust, and fit my pampered papillon perfectly. The hard plastic clasp closed tightly and securely, and the metal loop to connect a leash/dog tags is very solid. Overall, if you’re looking for a good dog collar at a reasonable price, this is a good one to consider.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great collar! But beware of sizing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar! It's high-quality and feels very study and durable. I like the quick-release clip, the D-ring for leash and tags, and the adjustable size. My only complaint is the sizing. After reading the reviews and doing some research, I bought a small for my 17-lb, 3-month-old husky puppy and it's still too big for her. Once she grows into it, it will be perfect, but I'm disappointed that the sizes are off.
customer_reviews.author: Live.Laugh.Love.

customer_reviews.title: Do not bother with this collar.
customer_reviews.text: This collar has been on our dog for 6 months and its been infuriating. Firstly, the martingale is hardly 2 inches wide, so it barely tightens and your dog will keep pulling. It should not even be called a martingale collar. Secondly, there is no easy way to remove the collar from your dog since there is no clasp. Trying to take this on and off your dog will make you struggle every time. Do yourself a favor and find something else with a clasp and a martingale with a loop at least 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Jess and Dan

customer_reviews.title: I still like it, and I'm hoping it will fit better ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute and simple dog collar. My only complaint is that, despite ordering the extra small, it is still a bit too small for my miniature schnauzer puppy's very tiny neck. It adjusts smaller, but there's a rubber label sewn onto it (shown in photo) that blocks you from tightening it all the way. I was able to shove the label into the plastic part that moves along the collar to tighten it, but now it sticks out in a strange way. I still like it, and I'm hoping it will fit better as she grows. I especially like the snap fastener feature--it's secure, but makes it easy to remove for baths and what not.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4Kids

customer_reviews.title: Want to love it but can't
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my pit bull and love the dark pink with the yellow text BUT when you adjust the collar to fit, the adjustment buckle is too small so it won't lay down on your dog's neck. It sticks straight up and looks dumb. (See picture) The large collar is HUGE so you have to adjust it unless you're purchasing it for a Saint Bernard. And the medium is too thin looking for my dog. (And the medium, I got for my smaller dog has the same issue). If you're not picky about this sort of thing, this collar will probably work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hnt

customer_reviews.title: the logo is in the way
customer_reviews.text: I do dog rescue and needed a heavy duty collar that resists chewing andcomes in a lot of colors for identifying different puppies in a litter. I need a collar that works for puppies from 6 to 12 weeks. The small in this collar is to large. If they moved the stupid logo, the collar could be made smaller and might work. I had to go to Petco and buy their collars. I was disappointed because I really liked the range of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Marek

customer_reviews.title: The location of the label prevents the buckle from being tightened all the way
customer_reviews.text: I have just purchased this product and got a small without measuring my dogs neck, the small fits just how I need it to as I am not using it to attach to leash for walking . Something I did not consider when purchasing this size collar for my 10 lb dog was that the blueberry logo cannot move through the buckle so the tightest it goes is to the label. I would consider this if you are thinking between sizes and may want a snugger fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. It’s easy to clean as well. The light pink color is really cute and doesn’t hurt my dogs skin at all. She’s been wearing it for many months now and it’s kept up great considering she’s a very active pup (she’s a 50lb lab mix). I clean it about once a week and it’s still in good shape. The hardware hasn’t broken and is just starting to turn a little gold now after so long. Will definitely be getting another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Joana

customer_reviews.title: Great collar just be sure to measure your pet correctly
customer_reviews.text: I got a standard collar size large for my 55lb (lean but large) hound and a medium size for my (thick) 35lber. The large collar is borderline too big for my dog but it also depends on how it sits on her (whether she’s sitting, standing, laying down, etc). Sometimes it fits good, other times it’s to loose. Tightened it as tight as it goes. Might have been better off just getting a medium and loosening it as far as it goes. But too late for that. Still a really nice collar and beautiful color, just beware of sizing and be sure to measure correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really like Blueberry Pet collars. They're sturdy. They're nice. I accidentally ordered one that was too big for my pet and they kindly offered to send me the right size at no extra charge. Such a great company. Incredible customer service and they respond via email almost immediately. 5 stars! Thanks Blueberry Pet!
customer_reviews.author: Cass&Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty In Pink for my Penny Pumpernickel
customer_reviews.text: I was told I needed a six foot leash for class and have been fighting with that leash for six months. Finally, a neighbor with a graceful greyhound showed me how a Martingale collar would solve the problem of my little Houdini (Penny Pumpernickel) getting out of three different harnesses and two collars. I found a great hot pink Martingale collar by Blueberry and then found a great leash to coordinate and it is 4 feet so that I have more control without getting tied up in knots and getting trip (hard on these 65 year-old bones). Penny and I are happy to represent!!! We give the collar and leash both five blueberries!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I foster lots of dogs in a years time. Bought three of these for some puppies I was fostering. All the puppies itched with these. I tried them again when they were 12 weeks old and they started itching again within one day. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cute collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar is very cute. The color is very accurate and matches the picture. The reason I am giving it 4 stars is that the clasp is not very strong. It is very easy to pull it apart without pressing in the sides. This is not a huge concern for me because I don't attach the leash to the collar while walking my dog (she has a harness) and I'm mainly using the collar for the dog tags. If you have a dog who likes to pull on walks and you plan on attaching the leash to the collar, I would suggest a different brand just in case the collar comes off when the dog pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael I.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Based on the description and reviews I expected better. The plastic buckles appear to be made from hard, brittle material. This collar is also very narrow and smaller than described. It was purchased to replace an old generic collar from Walmart of the same size and is smaller, narrower and lower quality. The best I can say about this collar is that it appears to be adequate. Only time will tell if it lasts the 10+ years the old one did with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really, really cute! Our 8-week old golden hadn't worn a collar before, but when we tried this collar, she didn't seem to notice or even mind. I bought a matching leash and they look so cute on her! Ivy, our new puppy, has had a smooth transition into our household. She is responsive and eager to please. She has already learned how to sit! Blueberry pet has helped us make a transition to leash training as well! Ivy is a delight and so is her collar-great product!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor and Mom

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second collar I bought. The first one lasted about a year and a half, before switching phone numbers and I got a new one to match my new phone number. The phone number actually came in handy when my pup got out of the backyard by accident. The people that found him were able to call me to pick him up! I was so happy and relieved!!! The small fits my small/medium dachshund-terrier, with some room to spare. Some of the stitching is starting to come apart on the writing part, which didn’t happen to the first one, but it’s no big deal. I would recommend this product to my doggy families.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Phone number is huge! A privacy issue
customer_reviews.text: It’s a well made product and super cute. But having my phone number in enormous sized print feels like a privacy issue. Any stranger could get my phone number easily from a distance looking at my dog. I recommend they print the phone number smaller and maybe the name twice instead.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bria

customer_reviews.title: A Blueberry Pet Fan
customer_reviews.text: Loved that I could order another product from this company. I was very pleased to see that I could order a personalized collar. Many dog owners have used metal tags that seem to dull and discolor making the engraving almost illegible. With my dog's information directly on his collar I am assured that same thing won't happen, plus I don't have to worry about losing the tag or the jingling sound. I have owned Blueberry Pet products in the past and they have proven to be pretty durable and long lasting even after laundering.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: BEST COLLARS EVER!!! ❤
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to write a review. I have had these now for my Chug and my Catahula Cur dog for almost a year now and THEY ARE AMAZING!!! Very durable and well made!! I am grateful to you. My Chatty Hula escaped one day and i recieved a phone call from a nearby neighbor; due to the WONDERFUL embroidered phone number! I work in veterinary medicine and reccomend these to everyone!!! THANK YOU❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: SherriM

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this in both XS and Small. One of my dogs has an 11" neck and the other has a 13" neck. The small fits my bigger dog fine. Seems nice and sturdy. The XS, though, is more like a cat collar. It is not as wide as the small. I can barely see it on his neck. I'm probably going to send it back. I just don't see how it can stand up to my dogs' rough play. It seems, otherwise, well made and sturdy enough for a cat or, maybe, a calm dog.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great color, no quick release clip though!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar. the quality and color is fantastic, perfect for a Shiba Inu who has a smaller head than her neck but I should have looked at the pictures and item description more closely! I wanted a martingale collar that also had a quick release clip and this does not. You have to place it over the head rather than clip it around the neck to get on and off which does limit its use with collar accessories and e-collars. I'm a little Leary about using it for a puppy since I like the added safety a release clip has.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: ~~For my two Boxers~~~
customer_reviews.text: Time to change both colllars and these looked nice on the Amazon page. They are one inch thick, blue and red in color, appear durable with nice craftsmanship. Sturdiness is the main feature I look for when purchasing a dog collar. Will update if any problems occur. Highly recommended and my Boxers looks nice with their her new blue and red collars.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity...

customer_reviews.title: The closer broke within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The collar looked great. All information was correct and legible. Colors a little off but I realize our computer screens may not always show true color. I do not use a collar with a leash so no strain was put on the closer. I use a harness for leashes and walking. I like to have a collar for inside control if I need to restrain my dog while I open a door or separating them if they are playing too rough. I wouldn't trust this collar for normal walks. If it broke then a pet could be harmed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Happy it works in Tesla Model 3 but a tad too long
customer_reviews.text: On its shortest setting it is still a little too long and still allows my 10 lbs Yorkie to attempt a jump out the car when I open the door, causing her to hang for a minute until I grab her and pick her back up into the seat to change out the seatbelt teether to a leash. However, it does serve its purpose of preventing her from darting out into traffic and the blush color is so cute. I just wish they designed it to be 2 inches shorter on the smallest setting. I don’t regret my purchase and I plan to get a second one for the back seat for my other Yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality collar but ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this collar was ordered for my Schipperke/Chihuahua girl who weighs 9 lbs. in Fired Brick, XS, which is a very pretty color, but darker than the picture shown. The problem is that according to neck measurements it should have fit, however, it's too small. Actually, it fits my Maltese and he weighs 7 lbs. So, with this manufacturer the sizes run small. With another manufacturer I had ordered a Small and it was way too big for her and in fact fit my Schip who weighs 17 lbs. Obviously, the manufacturers do not have an industry standard, which has proved costly to me.
customer_reviews.author: pandag

customer_reviews.title: Expected regular orange, color is more like neon orange.
customer_reviews.text: I'll tell you why I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5. The color. I ordered the orange. In this picture it looks like a paleish orange. When I received it, the color is more like neon orange. This is not to say I will not order other colors, I will just try to remember that the colors are more bold than the picture shows. After taking several photos trying to get the right color, it is still not showing the true neon color in the photo. It is more neon than my photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: pcomsec

customer_reviews.title: 3 time off the leash
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue of the collar coming unlatched. I'm not sure what caused the issue, it seems tight. My 10# puppy was just walking, not pulling aggressively it came off attached to the leash. Thankfully my puppy hadn't caught on that he was free so no harm any time.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Martingale style collar! The color is exactly what I got in my product! What I love about this collar is that there is no chain like my last Martingale collar, making it so much lighter! I have a medium size 25lb dog and the Medium size fit perfectly. It is adjustable of course! There is no clip to take apart the collar, but even without it, it fits the neck snugly and can be easily taken apart when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Suh

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar. Poor embroidery on personalized message.
customer_reviews.text: This will be for our newest GSD pup when we pick him up in 3 weeks. I'll update the review after using it on him. It seems sturdy enough and I like the colors (olive with orange personalization of his name and my phone number). Unfortunately the embroidery is not neat and not straight. We were disappointed when we looked at it and thought about getting a new one but he'll only be in it for a short while so I guess we'll just live with it. Bummer though.
customer_reviews.author: We3GermanShepherds

customer_reviews.title: Shortening the collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar would have worked if I could have shortened it more. The buckle will not override the Blue Berry rubber logo. Also the buckle sticks up and does not lay very flat against the dogs neck. I am keeping it but will be operating on it to rip off the logo so I can adjust it where it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Day 2 of my dog wearing this and her bottom part of her mouth got caught in the middle loop of the collar and had to cut the collar off of her. The trauma for both her and I was awful and thank god I was home and saw the situation immediately or it could of been way worse. Look elsewhere for a martingale with a LARGE LOOP, so nothing can get caught in it and become a dangerous situation.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Like everything except...
customer_reviews.text: This seems sturdy and well made. Fits well. My issue is with the color. Maybe I missed a way to order the embroidery color. I ordered a French Pink collar and the color of the embroidery is very close to the color of the collar. You have to look hard to actually see the phone number. Unless you can see a way to order a specific embroidery color I would be very hesitant to order one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs big, otherwise it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the color!! Seems well made. I got the custom 1. Phone number is very easy and clear to read. Only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because it runs big. I got a size small, which is the size he wears in every other harness and collar he has. But if I tighten it to where it needs to be for him, it’ll cover 1-2 digits of the phone number. He’s 25 lbs. an x-small seemed like it would’ve been too small
customer_reviews.author: Linda Strebel

customer_reviews.title: love, LOVE, love these Martingale collars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a huge fan of Martingale collars since purchasing the first one for my dog. They’re simple to use and most importantly, eliminate the worry of your dog slipping out of their collar -which is incredibly important for their safety. I purchased two of these for my mom’s two dogs and she and I both are so pleased with them! They’re true to size and the colors are gorgeous. Highly recommend! Pictured is the ‘Marina Blue’
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product & excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the personalized dog collar! I bought 2 for my dogs and the one was too big even though I measured as instructed. Contacted Blueberry Pet Essentials and got fantastic customer service. Inquired about what my options were and they offered to send me another personalized collar in the correct size! Quick response to my inquiry and within a few days had my new collar. Could not be happier and highly recommend!!!!! Will not hesitate to order other products from them!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Liston

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing, but great embroidery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for my dog. Loved it, loved that I could get her name and number embroidered right on it instead of having to use a metal tag. It got grubby after a while so I ordered a new one in the same size but a different color. For some reason it seemed like it was a lot bigger than the first one I ordered. I couldn't tighten it any further and she slipped it several times. If they could really double check the sizing I'd love to order more.
customer_reviews.author: cbagwell

customer_reviews.title: Will not be using
customer_reviews.text: I did just as the directions' asked and measured her neck, sent in the information. However, I was not counting on the Blueberry Pet Essentials logo to take up so much room that when I did receive this collar, I had to adjust it to fit her. It left a large lump in the top that looks very uncomfortable as well as covering up her information. Because of this strategic logo placing, I will not be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: SjkM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, 100% happy, but measure your dog's next
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! I am so glad that I ordered blueberry embroidered collars! It's top-notch quality and exactly as described. I would definitely measure your dog's neck and don't go by the chart like I did. I made the mistake of ordering a collar that was too big just going by the suggested weight. I reordered a medium rather than a large for my 55 lb dog. overall I'm really happy the customer service is amazing! the shipping was much faster than advertised so I was pleasantly surprised when the caller showed up at my door within a few days. planning on ordering another one for my small dog and one for my mom's dog as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar. It's super durable, easy to tighten/loosen, and it's adorable. My only hesitation is the color. Obviously, I got the light pink and after about 5 months of normal wear and tear, it's dulled to a brownish pink. I love Blueberry Pet and have ordered one of their personalized, embroidered, floral collars too. I think I would recommend something patterned or dark colored over this. Overall though, awesome product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: and his head is like 12" and you have to put the collar over ...
customer_reviews.text: Measured my Pomsky's neck at 10" and ordered an X-small (7.5-10"). it was way WAY too small.....I measured the fully extended Xsmall collar at 9.5", and his head is like 12" and you have to put the collar over that. They should change the description from just neck to also head circumference ( I thought they had factored this into collar design automatically) Ordering a Medium now.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: FIT AND CONSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.text: the color is spot on but the leads are rather skimpy for the larger leads and have small clasp. I also had trouble with the fit on the harness for my older boy. The med. harness was way to small and the large harness on the tightest draw was still to big for him. He is a ridgeback so he has a barrel chest but the harness from another company which I can't get anymore fit perfect. So other than that the products are nice and I have used them and will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!  DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic clasp/connector was locked in position a few days ago. After prying the thing apart I looked at it and there was no visible damage to any of the plastic. However my puppy was coughing/gagging and I needed to get the collar off quickly only to find it stuck on her neck. Ended up having to cut the fabric to get it off her neck. Very scary though. Would recommend going somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Must have for doggie travelers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Keeps my dog in place and out of my lap when I am driving. Sturdy and I was able to match his collar that I have from the same maker. A must for any road trip where you don’t want to cage your dog! Gives them just enough length to comfortably move around a bit. I liked that I could still clip his leash onto his collar while the tether was still attached. Kept him from jumping out of the car before I had his leash on. Clicks into seatbelt perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend! Blueberry is the best quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love Blueberry! It never fails. The color options are adorable and they last FOREVER. Highly recommend. And Piper loves it too! P.S. Don’t mind my dog’s ears in the picture, she has a double ear infection and the meds we put in make her ears look extra greasy. But I wanted to show how cute the lavender color is! We previously purchased a dark purple and that one is still holding up, we just wanted a color change this time. Super cute! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Closson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The product that arrived was well made, sturdy and arrived on time. It was not the collar I had ordered. I ordered dark blue collars and i got teal collars with pink bows and little pink hearts. The rest of the order was fine. Additionally, this is my second attempt to leave a review. The last one was deleted by Amazon because it didn't meet some sort of standard. I might try to order these again, as I use the colors to keep track of a flock of goats. If my review gets deleted, or if I don't get what I paid for again, I will shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: N. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Well made great choice of colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought 11 different colors..I had 11 pups, and they have gone through 4 different collars if I include the yarn when they were 1st born. This collar brand was the only one who had all the colors I needed and the some without repeating colors. They have grown well with the pups who are all now 16 weeks and held up well to them all chewing on each other's collars with super sharp puppy teeth! I would recommend them to anyone who asked and will buy them again on next litter.
customer_reviews.author: Jefri Detrick

customer_reviews.title: Great look and fit for the Blueberry dog collar.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I received the Blueberry dog collar today. I was impressed with the quality of it. My dog is a tea-cup-sized Chihuahua. She looks great in it. Her neck measured just under 8 inches in diameter. I had to adjust the collar to its smallest size but it fits and there is room to grow. The collar arrived quickly. I highly recommend the Blueberry collar for your dog. The color was right on and it matched Coco’s dog tag. Thank you Blueberry people for a great product. Definitely was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Zactec69

product_meta.title: Blueberry Pet Essentials 20+ Colors Classic Solid Color Collection - Regular Collars, Martingale Collars, Personalized Collars or Seatbelts
feature_bullets: Neck 12"-16", Width 5/8", Size Small; The collar does not stretch itself, please make sure leave ONLY 2 fingers between collar and dog neck. A properly fitting collar and harness won't leave any room for your dog to chew.
The collar is not for tie out. NEVER leave your dog unattended with a collar on.
This collar is a single product. However, it comes with matching leash/harness to complete the look. Leash and harness sold separately.
Nylon fabric with high density webbing to add durability; Those buckles are made from ecofriendly plastic. The metal D ring is chrome coated to add durability.

All pictures are taken with our production samples from a size of Medium; Please measure your pets carefully for making the right purchase. Always look at the size chart for the recommended weight range to confirm the size.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
